https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/p6QfDLXrO2PX5xAl2x2koJmwlNa.jpg A romantic drama set in Germany just before WWI and centered on a married woman who falls in love with her husband's teacher. Separated by the war, they pledge their devotion to one another. A Promise
